metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19725 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
sysstat through 12.2.0 has a double free in check_file_actlst in sa_common.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

isag - 11.6.1-1ubuntu0.1
sysstat - 11.6.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sysstat package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.6.1-1ubuntu0.1').
